definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: In the steel used in insulating glass windows is a very effective approach.
sentences.chinese: 在塑鋼窗中採用中空玻璃就是一個很有效的辦法。

sentences.english: A butyl rubber based adhesive for hot melt application as sealant for cavity-glass was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 採用丁基橡膠研製了用於中空玻璃單道密封的熱熔膠。

sentences.english: It is not necessary to remove the coating from the edges in IGU fabrication.
sentences.chinese: 加工時可直接合成中空玻璃，無須除去邊部膜層。

sentences.english: Its heat insulation performance is way beyond ordinary insulating glass even Low-E coated insulating glass.
sentences.chinese: 隔熱保溫效果大大優於普通中空玻璃。

sentences.english: Aluminum Spacing Strip Production Line for insulating glass " ."
sentences.chinese: 中空玻璃用鋁隔條生產線。

sentences.english: The development trend of insulating glass sealants was reviewed also.
sentences.chinese: 概述了中空玻璃密封膠的發展趨勢。

sentences.english: A necessary machine in compound rubber strip of insulating glass.
sentences.chinese: 該機是用製作複合膠條式中空玻璃的必備產品。

definition: acetal resin/Delrin/unplasticized polyvinyl chloride (uPVC or rigid PVC)
